version_description:
- 新增俄语
- 新增反馈功能

本次更新

赛事页面大升级：
• 新增赛事头条：第一时间获取赛事结果通知、赛事资讯动态
• 新增正在进行的比赛：再也不会忘记参加了哪些比赛活动了
• 新增我参加的：统一聚合我参加的赛事
• 界面设计优化

近期更新
• 天天赏金赛火爆进行中！每天百万赏金！
• 增加版本更新提醒
• 红包可以设置不弹出了

We update the app as often as possible to make it faster and more reliable for you. Check back next week to see the latest features and fixes available.

Love the app? Rate us! Your support keeps the YODO RUN engine running.
Have a question? Tap feedback in the YODO RUN app or visit www.51yund.com.

1. The Yodo Medical Center is online! Yodo uses mobile hardware to combine AI algorithms. Analyze your body with big data. Protect your health.

2. Now become a Yodo member. In addition to enjoying cheaper price, you can also generate more detailed medical report. Yodo keeps track of your physical condition and monitors your trends. And also establish a membership group, and the first members will receive an official priority response after feedback.

3. Yodo updated the step reporting mechanism to optimize some bugs.

4. More customized exercise plans and task rewards will be online soon. Stay tuned!

2. Yodo continuous subscription is online!

"Science Sports Plan" The Latest Updating！
Updating Yodo and you will find a training program that suits you and get professional guidance. AI Intelligence will develop a training program that suits you based on the results of your finger exam. Of course, AI can do more that AI will dynamically adjust your exclusive course based on the results of your physical examination data. You could get the most scientific fitness program!

Magical plan for People of all ages ！
Yodo also has a rehabilitation program for postoperative and exercise injuries! In addition to the current version, there are 300 sets of rehabilitation courses to be launched in subsequent editions. Users who have become VIPs before could enjoy all subsequent courses and membership privileges for free. With the enrichment of courses and the increase in membership privileges, the price of subscription will gradually increase, so don't hesitate any more, subscribe it now!
